aposa samanya pela wibhagayen ithihasaye prathama warata mewara wadima pirisak samathwa usas pela sandaha sudusukam laba sitithi.ee anuwa siyayata 64.74k dena prathama warata wibhagayata peni sita usas pela hadarimata sudusukam laba thibe.sisun 268995 denaku wibhagayata peni sita in 174160k usas pela hadarimata samath wi atha.wasara 2005 usas pela igenumata sudusukam labu sisuu prathishathaya siyayata 49.70ki.

balashakthi arapirimasma, balashakthi sanrakshanaya, surya balashakthiya nipadawima ha bhawithaya, kasala kalamanakaranaya ha kasala magin balashakthiya nipadawima pilibandawa mahajanathawa danuwath kirima,kabanika pohora nipadawima ha ema kabanika pohora bhawithaya thulin kabanika wagawa dirimath kirima,nagarika parisarayaka pihiti rajaye aayathanayak lesa parisara kalamanakaranaya thulin thirasara sanwardhanaya sakshath kara ganima sandaha aadarshayak sapayima mema haritha sathiye pradhana aramunu weyi.

methanadi apata sithiya yuthu deyak thamayi itha balawath, yuda shakthiyen anuna rawana raju yuddhayen ramata paradunada yana waga...rawana rajuge pawule wisthara hariyatama dana ganna thiyena mulashra adu namuth ramayanaya anuwa apita rawana rajule puwale wisthara me widiyata goda naganna puluwan.pulathisi srushiwaraya -rawana rajuge piya parshawayen siyasumali - rawana rajuge mawu parshawayen siyawishrawas muni - rawana rajuge piyakayikeshi - rawana rajuge mawasubhanu ha maricha - rawana rajuge mamawarun (mawage sahodarayan)kuwera - rawana rajuge sahodaraya(wishrawas munige rakus biridage puthraya)wibhishana - rawana rajuge sahodaraya.

ema tharagayedi shri lanka mada pela pithikaruwange sarthakathwayak diswini.anjalo mathiws ohuge krida diwiye hondama ekdina krikat inima krida karaminda (pandu 85kin lakunu 89), mahela jayawardhana darshaniya pithiharambaayaka niyaleminda (lakunu 63), thaman thawamath lakunu athara sitina bawa thahawuru kalaha.
